name: apoc.convert.setJsonProperty(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node node,String key,Object value)
description: apoc.json.setJsonProperty(node,key,complexValue) - sets value serialized to JSON as property with the given name on the node

name: apoc.convert.toTree(java.util.List<org.neo4j.graphdb.Path> paths)
description: apoc.convert.toTree([paths]) creates a stream of nested documents representing the at least one root of these paths

name: apoc.convert.toMap(Object map)
description: apoc.convert.toMap(value) | tries it's best to convert the value to a map

name: apoc.convert.toString(Object string)
description: apoc.convert.toString(value) | tries it's best to convert the value to a string

name: apoc.convert.toList(Object list)
description: apoc.convert.toList(value) | tries it's best to convert the value to a list

name: apoc.convert.toBoolean(Object bool)
description: apoc.convert.toBoolean(value) | tries it's best to convert the value to a boolean

name: apoc.convert.toNode(Object node)
description: apoc.convert.toNode(value) | tries it's best to convert the value to a node

name: apoc.convert.toRelationship(Object relationship)
description: apoc.convert.toRelationship(value) | tries it's best to convert the value to a relationship

name: apoc.convert.toSet(Object list)
description: apoc.convert.toSet(value) | tries it's best to convert the value to a set

name: apoc.convert.getJsonProperty(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node node,String key)
description: apoc.json.getJsonProperty(node,key) - converts serialized JSON in property to structure again
